es.ucm.fdi.tp.view

Class PlayerUI<S extends GameState<S,A>,A extends GameAction<S,A>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.view.PlayerUI<S,A>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TttPlayerUI, WasPlayerUI

    public abstract class PlayerUI<S extends GameState<S,A>,A extends GameAction<S,A>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class in charge of the visual components on GUI mode for a given player.

    2 (03/05/2017)
